name: TimeController
description:
TimeController

Drive around with a remote controlled car. To prevent crashing into walls, you can go back in time for 2 seconds. What obstacles can you pass using this new found superpower? Test your skill on 13 unique levels.

This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #5. Therefore Zoey the cat is not missing. Can you find both appearances?

Controls:

A / D - Remote control the vehicle
SPACE - control time
M - Toggle music
S - Toggle sound
1 - Reload the game in small-mode
2 - Reload the game in default-mode
3 - Reload the game in large-mode
